result.longName: Hubei Chaozhuo Aviation Technology Co., Ltd.
result.prevName: Hubei Chaozhuo Aviation Technology Co., Ltd

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Hubei Chaozhuo Aviation Technology Co., Ltd. provides cold spray additive manufacturing technology for the aircraft maintenance and remanufacturing industry. It is also involved in the manufacturing and maintenance of civil aircraft parts and airborne equipment; maintenance of military and civil aircraft pneumatic accessories, hydraulic accessories, and fuel and electrical accessories; and sale of civil aviation materials, mechanical parts and components, packaging special equipment, machinery and equipment, and 3D printing basic materials. In addition, it manufactures packaging, printing, and general and special-purpose equipment. Further, the company manufactures and sells pulping and papermaking special equipment, ferrous metal alloys, additive manufacturing equipment, paint, and high-speed rail equipment and accessories. Additionally, it engages in the processing of mechanical parts and parts; mechanical equipment, new material technology, and metal products research and development; technology development; rental of special equipment; and provision of metal cutting, spray processing, metal surface and heat treatment, precious metal smelting, and 3D printing services, as well as technical consultation, exchange, transfer, promotion services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Xiangyang, China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Bozhe  Jiang
